span.p:
Default Deny
All Other East/West Traffic Blocked

span.p:
Brokers (StatefulSet x3)
CLIENT :9092 (SSL)
INTERNAL :9094 (SSL)
mTLS Required

span.p:
In-Cluster Clients
Kafka Producers / Consumers
mTLS Authentication Required

span.p:
Embedded FIPS 140 Validated Crypto Module
Approved Cipher Suites Only
TLS 1.0 / 1.1 Rejected
